short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small tool for message platforms like Facebook, Zalo,. You can blur/show messsage, stories by toggle button in option page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small tool for Message platform like Facebook, Zalo,... Auto blur/show chat, stories on facebook and messenger based on config in extension option.

In the next version, I will add a feature to hide messages in the chat box. If you have any ideas, please let me know.
